title: A Positive Approach to Communicating with Your Teen
itunes:author: Guest: Jim Burns
itunes:summary: Maintaining healthy communication with your teenager can feel like trying to solve a complicated puzzle. John and Danny will provide some helpful ideas for how you can have good conversations with your teen. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!
